media.title: The Secret Lair
media.description: Our legendary practice shed where the ambient rarely gets above freezing. Where the magic (and several noise complaints) happen.

media.title: DeadBeat's Kit - 3 of 4
media.description: Pulled from Brain's basement in questionable condition. DeadBeat's restoration process: Step 1, moose antlers. Step 2, scotch. There was no Step 3. Somehow, they sound incredible.

media.title: SnowMan's Guitars
media.description: A collection of six-strings and bad decisions. Each one has a story we probably shouldn't tell.

media.title: Odd Fellows Hall Set List
media.description: Snowman's 40th. Odd Fellows Hall (we fit right in). Friends, beer, and a setlist we had no business attempting. DeadBeat's voice checked out mid-show. The audience was relieved.

media.title: Behind the Shed
media.description: What happens behind the shed stays behind the shed. But here's photographic evidence anyway.

media.title: The Original Lineup (1997)
media.description: When we had hair, hope, and hearing. Historical document of our questionable youth.

media.title: Ecclestiastics Behind the Scenes
media.description: Watch us pretend we know what we're doing in a real studio. Spoiler: We didn't.
